Class DBOrderService

org.project3.rest_api.database.services.DBOrderService
@Repository public class DBOrderService extends DBConnector
Implements order-related database actions

    • selectOrdersByHour

      public List<Double> selectOrdersByHour()
      Selects the total number of orders grouped by hour. This only returns hours of the day up until the current hour, determined by Java's internal DateTime methods.
      Returns:
      a List<Double> of orders placed, grouped by hour. Index 0 corresponds to the 1st hour, etc.

    • selectOrdersByHourForDay

      public List<Double> selectOrdersByHourForDay()
      Selects the total number of orders placed grouped by hour. This returns all hours of the day (1-12).
      Returns:
      a List<Double> of order placed, grouped by hour. Index 0 corresponds to the 1st hour, etc.

    • selectSalesByHour

      public List<Double> selectSalesByHour()
      Selects the sum of order prices grouped by hour. This only returns hours of the day up until the current hour, determined by Java's internal DateTime methods.
      Returns:
      a List<Double> of order price totals, grouped by hour. Index 0 corresponds to the 1st hour, etc.

    • selectSalesByHourForDay

      public List<Double> selectSalesByHourForDay()
      Selects the sum of order prices grouped by hour. This returns all hours of the day (1-12).
      Returns:
      a List<Double> of order price totals, grouped by hour. Index 0 corresponds to the 1st hour, etc.

    • fetchXOrZReport

      public Map<String,List<Double>> fetchXOrZReport(boolean wholeDay)
      Generates X/Z Report showing the total sales and orders per hour, determines whether to show the entire day or the hours since opening based on which report is being requested.
      Parameters:
      wholeDay - true if we're fetching the Z report, false for X report
      Returns:
      a map containing lists of sales and orders by hour
